c1.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
c1.effect: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

c2.name: Oil Meets Fire
c2.effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the enemy for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c3.name: Deepfry
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Guoba Mad
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Condensed Pyronado
c6.effect: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
